mapper.select: select * from( select row_number() over(ORDER BY a.attend_date ) no, a.attend_date ,c2.code_value branch_name ,c3.code_value department_name, c.code_value rank_name,e.emp_name, to_char(a.attend_on,'hh24:mi') attend_on, to_char(a.attend_off,'hh24:mi') attend_off , c4.code_value att_state from tbl_attend a left join tbl_emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no left join tbl_org o on e.emp_no = o.emp_no left join tbl_code c on o.rank_code = c.code_category||c.code_num left join tbl_code c2 on o.branch_code = c2.code_category||c2.code_num left join tbl_code c3 on o.dept_code = c3.code_category||c3.code_num left join tbl_code c4 on a.att_code = c4.code_category||c4.code_num ) b where no between ${beginList} and ${endList} order by b.attend_date desc

select a.attend_date ,c2.code_value branch_name ,c3.code_value department_name, c.code_value rank_name,e.emp_name, a.attend_on, a.attend_off , c4.code_value att_state from tbl_attend a left join tbl_emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no left join tbl_org o on e.emp_no = o.emp_no left join tbl_code c on o.rank_code = c.code_category||c.code_num left join tbl_code c2 on o.branch_code = c2.code_category||c2.code_num left join tbl_code c3 on o.dept_code = c3.code_category||c3.code_num left join tbl_code c4 on a.att_code = c4.code_category||c4.code_num where e.emp_name like '%'||#{keyword}||'%'

select a.*,GET_CODE_VALUE(a.ATT_CODE) ATT_STATE from tbl_attend a inner join tbl_emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no WHERE a.attend_date <= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.emp_no = #{emp_no} order by attend_date desc

select a.*,GET_CODE_VALUE(a.ATT_CODE) ATT_STATE from tbl_attend a inner join tbl_emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no
WHERE attend_date <= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') AND attend_date > = to_char(current_date-7, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and a.emp_no = #{emp_no} order by attend_date desc

select a.attend_date ,c2.code_value branch_name ,c3.code_value department_name,c.code_value rank_name,e.emp_name, (TO_CHAR(ATTEND_OFF , 'hh24') - TO_CHAR(ATTEND_ON , 'hh24')) work_time from tbl_attend a left join tbl_emp e on a.emp_no = e.emp_no left join tbl_org o on e.emp_no = o.emp_no left join tbl_code c on o.rank_code = c.code_category||c.code_num left join tbl_code c2 on o.branch_code = c2.code_category||c2.code_num left join tbl_code c3 on o.dept_code = c3.code_category||c3.code_num order by a.attend_date ,c2.code_value,c3.code_value,c.code_num, e.emp_name

select count (case when att_code='W4' then 1 end) AS Count_W4 from tbl_attend where emp_no=#{emp_no}
and attend_date <= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and attend_date > = to_char(current_date-7, 'yyyy/mm/dd')

select a.attend_date, to_char(a.attend_on,'hh24:mi') attend_on, to_char(a.attend_off,'hh24:mi') attend_off ,GET_CODE_VALUE(a.ATT_CODE) ATT_STATE from tbl_attend a where a.att_code = 'W4' and a.emp_no=#{emp_no} order by a.attend_date desc

select count (case when att_code='W3' then 1 end) AS count_W3 from tbl_attend where emp_no=#{emp_no}
and attend_date <= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and attend_date > = to_char(current_date-7, 'yyyy/mm/dd')

select a.attend_date, to_char(a.attend_on,'hh24:mi') attend_on, to_char(a.attend_off,'hh24:mi') attend_off ,GET_CODE_VALUE(a.ATT_CODE) ATT_STATE from tbl_attend a where a.att_code = 'W3' and a.emp_no=#{emp_no} order by a.attend_date desc

select count (case when att_code='W2' then 1 end) AS count_W2 from tbl_attend where emp_no=#{emp_no}
and attend_date <= to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd') and attend_date > = to_char(current_date-7, 'yyyy/mm/dd')

select a.attend_date, to_char(a.attend_on,'hh24:mi') attend_on, to_char(a.attend_off,'hh24:mi') attend_off ,GET_CODE_VALUE(a.ATT_CODE) ATT_STATE from tbl_attend a where a.att_code = 'W2' and a.emp_no=#{emp_no} order by a.attend_date desc
mapper.update: UPDATE tbl_attend SET attend_off = to_char(current_date,'yyyy/mm/dd hh24:mi:ss') , att_code='W1' WHERE emp_no= #{emp_no} and attend_date = to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
mapper.delete: delete from tbl_attend where emp_no = #{emp_no} and attend_date = to_char(current_date, 'yyyy/mm/dd')
mapper.update: update tbl_attend set attend_off = null , att_code = 'W0' where emp_no=#{emp_no} and attend_date =to_char(current_date,'yyyy/mm/dd')
